title: Hey GD, I donated about 18 inches of hair to Locks of Love today
body:
Nobody knows me here, but I just had a fun experience today and wanted to share it with my friends, but I don't have any friends, so I'm sharing it with you guys.

I've been growing out my hair for 4-5 years now because as a kid I was never allowed to have long hair so as soon as I could, I took advantage of it.
According to many of my customers (I'm a delivery driver), I have very "luscious" and "gorgeous" waves in my hair and they all tell me not to cut it ever, etc. etc.. My boss told me she'd cry if I cut my hair, so I'm excited to see that.

It was kind of a random decision. I wasn't really thinking of cutting my hair any time soon, then today at work I was just thinking "Hmmm I should donate my hair" and just went and did it after work. Nobody knows yet, and I'm going out with my family tomorrow night, so I'm excited to see their reactions.

Anyway, here are some pictures so you can see:


After it was cut off next to a ruler:
http://i.imgur.com/1wvoNG5.jpg

Before:
http://i.imgur.com/4XfJlSt.jpg

All tied up in ponytails:
http://i.imgur.com/AMeOYA2.jpg

Trying to be attractive with short hair:
http://i.imgur.com/PEHyrwF.jpg


Thanks for listening to my story GD! I know I'm not a very good story teller!
